body_html: The more general motivation for this change is that currently all loop Variables are pinned to the CPU, because they are colocated with the CPU-only RefExit. This means that the Variable data gets transferred on and off the GPU every loop iteration. Adding a GPU kernel for RefExit allows the whole loop to run on the GPU, which significantly improves performance.

body: The more general motivation for this change is that currently all loop Variables are pinned to the CPU, because they are colocated with the CPU-only `RefExit`.  This means that the Variable data gets transferred on and off the GPU every loop iteration.  Adding a GPU kernel for `RefExit` allows the whole loop to run on the GPU, which significantly improves performance.
